Package org.thewhitemage13.service

Class ValidationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.service.ValidationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValidationServiceInterface
@Service public class ValidationServiceImpl extends Object implements ValidationServiceInterface
Service implementation for validating like requests for posts and comments.

This service is responsible for validating that the post, comment, and user involved in a like operation exist before proceeding. It interacts with external clients, such as PostClient, CommentClient, and UserClient, to verify the existence of the corresponding entities. If any entity does not exist, it throws the appropriate exception.

Key Features:

  • Validates whether a post exists before liking it.
  • Validates whether a comment exists before liking it.
  • Validates whether a user exists before allowing them to like a post or comment.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • validatePostLike

      public void validatePostLike(CreateLikePost createLikePost)
      Validates that the post and user involved in the like operation exist.

      This method verifies that the specified post and user IDs exist by calling external services. If any of the entities do not exist, it throws an appropriate exception.

      Specified by:
      validatePostLike in interface ValidationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      createLikePost - the data required to like a post
      Throws:
      org.thewhitemage13.exceptions.PostNotFoundException - if the post with the specified ID does not exist
      org.thewhitemage13.exceptions.UserNotFoundException - if the user with the specified ID does not exist

    • validateCommentLike

      public void validateCommentLike(CreateLikeComment createLikeComment)
      Validates that the comment and user involved in the like operation exist.

      This method verifies that the specified comment and user IDs exist by calling external services. If any of the entities do not exist, it throws an appropriate exception.

      Specified by:
      validateCommentLike in interface ValidationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      createLikeComment - the data required to like a comment
      Throws:
      org.thewhitemage13.exceptions.CommentNotFoundException - if the comment with the specified ID does not exist
      org.thewhitemage13.exceptions.UserNotFoundException - if the user with the specified ID does not exist
